//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float3 EyePosVS;
//   float4 clipPlanes;
//   float4x4 matEye;
//   float4x4 matM2WS;
//   float4x4 matMVP;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name         Reg   Size
//   ------------ ----- ----
//   matMVP       c8       4
//   matEye       c12      3
//   matM2WS      c20      4
//   clipPlanes   c24      1
//   EyePosVS     c31      1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c0, 1, -1, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_texcoord o1
    dcl_texcoord1 o2
    dcl_texcoord2 o3.xyz

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s0

    mov r0.x, c12.z
    mov r0.y, c13.z
    mov r0.z, c14.z
    nrm r1.xyz, r0
    mul r0.xyz, c21, v0.y
    mad r0.xyz, c20, v0.x, r0
    mad r0.xyz, c22, v0.z, r0
    add r0.xyz, r0, c23

mul r29, c190, r0.x
mad r29, c191, r0.y, r29
mad r29, c192, r0.z, r29
add r29, c193, r29

mul r30, c184, r29.x
mad r30, c185, r29.y, r30
mad r30, c186, r29.z, r30
mad r30, c187, r29.w, r30

texldl r31, c220.z, s0
add r31.w, r30.w, -r31.y
mul r31.w, r31.w, r31.x

add r30.x, r30.x, r31.w

mul r29, c180, r30.x
mad r29, c181, r30.y, r29
mad r29, c182, r30.z, r29
mad r29, c183, r30.w, r29

mul r28, c194, r29.x
mad r28, c195, r29.y, r28
mad r28, c196, r29.z, r28
mad r28, c197, r29.w, r28

mov r0.xyz, r28

    add r0.xyz, r0, -c31
    dp3 o1.w, r1, r0
    mul o1.xyz, r0, c24.y

    mul r0, c9, v0.y
    mad r0, c8, v0.x, r0
    mad r0, c10, v0.z, r0
    add r0, r0, c11
    mov o0, r0

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py --auto-fix-vertex-halo --orig --in-place /cygdrive/c/Steam/SteamApps/common/demonicon/Dumps/AllShaders/VertexShader/9038076A.txt
texldl r31, c220.z, s0
add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mul o2, r0, c0.xyxx
    mov o3.xyz, c31

// approximately 20 instruction slots used
